name: HTTP Login Bruteforce
description: Bruteforce HTTP login forms with CSRF token support. Detects login forms automatically, handles CSRF tokens, and determines successful authentication. Supports custom username/password lists and integrates with nndefaccts default credentials database.
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Improper Restriction of Excessive Authentication Attempts
remediation: Implement account lockout after failed attempts. Use rate limiting. Implement CAPTCHA after failed attempts. Use multi-factor authentication. Monitor and alert on bruteforce attempts.
